Key:
(Class is finally over. If we were reading
current stuff, I could keep up, but...)

(The classics are just too much for me.
Practically a whole new language. It's
like it's from another planet.)

(Ah. At a loose end, Gion Temple's bell rings,
the river flows, day breaks in Spring, and the
Summer at night... Classics are such gibberish.)

(I don't want to run into Tonomachi, either.
Hm. What should I do today...?)
